title: Kaia Gerber shows off her toned figure in a cropped top and midi skirt
text:
She's one of modelling's most sought-after names.

But Kaia Gerber took a break from the grind on Monday as she was spotted on a shopping trip in the Malibu neighborhood of Los Angeles.

The 18-year-old beauty, who is the daughter of iconic supermodel Cindy Crawford, donned a light grey crop top that exposed her taut midriff and a midi-length skirt dipped in a navy floral pattern.

Cute: Kaia Gerber took a break from the grind on Monday as she was spotted on a shopping trip in the Malibu neighborhood of Los Angeles

She also rocked a pair of unreleased Cactus Plant Flea Market Air Force One sneakers that added volume to the otherwise streamlined look.

Her sighting comes as she recently opened up to Vogue about her mother's impact on her life.

'If anyone had a point of reference, I definitely did and one of the best ones,' she said.

Posh: The 18-year-old beauty, who is the daughter of iconic supermodel Cindy Crawford, donned a light grey crop top that exposed her taut midriff and a midi-length skirt dipped in a navy floral pattern

'For me [modeling] wasn't a foreign world to go into and I felt like I understood it. I knew what I was kind of getting into.'

And Cindy told the outlet that one of the most important things she showed Gerber was 'when you go to work with a photographer or designer, it is like do your homework.'

'I want to have a language. If I know this photographer shoots this way, when I get to set, I kind of already know what language we might be speaking that day as opposed to just walking in and not knowing anything about the editor or the designer or photographer.

Like mother like daughter: Cindy told the outlet that one of the most important things she showed Gerber was 'when you go to work with a photographer or designer, it is like do your homework'

'By the time Kaia has started in the fashion industry, she was pretty well versed,' she said.

Kaia scored her first modeling contract with IMG Models at the age of 13 and won her first solo cover shoot when she was 14 for LOVE Magazine.

Her LOVE Magazine cover was shot by none other than fellow model Kendall Jenner, who is Kaia's friend and mentor.
description: She's one of modelling's most sought-after names. But Kaia Gerber took a break from the grind on Monday as she was spotted on a shopping trip in the Malibu neighborhood
